| Overview = The [[Light Brigade]] was the most elite military corps of Majesdanian army.

| HistoryText             = The [[Light Brigade]] [[Majesdane]] stationed from several outposts including the moon base of [[Gheshua 9]].{{r|Runaways Vol 3 2}}

After the [[Skrull Empire|Skrulls]] had destroyed [[Majesdane]], the Light Brigade held [[Karolina Dean (Earth-616)|Karolina Dean]] responsible because her father, [[Frank Dean (Earth-616)|Frank Dean]], provided the coordinates of Majesdane to the Skrulls. To bring her to justice, the Light Brigade began to travel to [[Earth]] in search of Karolina Dean.{{r|Runaways Vol 3 1|2}} 

Once they arrived on [[Earth]], the Light Brigade attacked the [[Runaways (Earth-616)|Runaways]] in their [[Malibu House]]. When [[Nico Minoru (Earth-616)|Nico Minoru]] cast a spell to scatter the Light Brigade teleporting [[VaRikk (Earth-616)|vaRikk]] to the jungles of [[South America]], [[DeHalle (Earth-616)|deHalle]] to an iceberg near [[Antarctica]], and [[VaDrann (Earth-616)|vaDrann]] to the [[Great Wall of China]].{{r|Runaways Vol 3 1|3}}

Remotely summoning his [[Light Brigade's Ship|ship]], General vaDrann was able to rescue deHalle and VaRikk, and freed the captive [[DaVanti (Earth-616)|daVanti]].{{r|Runaways Vol 3 3}} After a daring battle with the Runaways, the Light Brigade was duped into taking captive [[Xavin (Earth-616)|Xavin]] posing as Karolina Dean.{{r|Runaways Vol 3 6}}

Years later, Xavin had won Karolinas' acquital and joined the Majesdanian army in their true identity, becoming a general. When Karolina's solar energy became almost fatally depleted, the Majesdanians became alerted of her condition. Under Xavin's orders, deHalle and daVanti traveled to Earth and retrieved her so they could treat her injury.{{r|Runaways Vol 5 38}}
